timeline.body: Is configuration change same as device deleted?
timeline.bodyText: Is configuration change same as device deleted?
timeline.bodyHTML: Is configuration change same as device deleted?
timeline.author: shahzaibj
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -400,6 +400,16 @@ private ErrorStrings() {
             "This device configuration was changed on the server. " +
                     "Please return the device to your administrator to restart the registration of this device.";
 
+    /**
+     * The device is registered with precreate/userless WPJ, and its registration was deleted by the admin.
+     * This is an irrecoverable error, and the admin has to re-prep the device.
+     * */
+    public static final String USERLESS_DEVICE_DELETED_ON_SERVER_ERROR_CODE =
+            "userless_device_deleted_on_server";
+    public static final String USERLESS_DEVICE_DELETED_ON_SERVER_ERROR_MESSAGE =
+            "This device configuration was changed on the server. " +

replies.bodyText: I guess I could just say that it's deleted. "configuration changed" might be too vague
replies.author: rpdome

timeline.bodyHTML:
Suggested change
"Please return the device to your administrator to restart the registration of this device.";
"Please return the device to your administrator to re-register this device.";
timeline.author: shahzaibj

timeline.body: Looks to be the same value as used for the `REGISTERED_SHARED_DEVICE_DELETED_ON_SERVER_ERROR_MESSAGE` declared on line 399. Perhaps there could be a private constant called `DEVICE_DELETED_ON_SERVER_ERROR_MESSAGE` and both the error codes for userless and shared device reference that constant?
timeline.bodyText: Looks to be the same value as used for the REGISTERED_SHARED_DEVICE_DELETED_ON_SERVER_ERROR_MESSAGE declared on line 399. Perhaps there could be a private constant called DEVICE_DELETED_ON_SERVER_ERROR_MESSAGE and both the error codes for userless and shared device reference that constant?
timeline.bodyHTML: Looks to be the same value as used for the REGISTERED_SHARED_DEVICE_DELETED_ON_SERVER_ERROR_MESSAGE declared on line 399. Perhaps there could be a private constant called DEVICE_DELETED_ON_SERVER_ERROR_MESSAGE and both the error codes for userless and shared device reference that constant?
timeline.author: shahzaibj

timeline.message: Update text to be more detailed (for debugging purpose)
